de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist

Interface DecoratorFactory<ChildType>

  • Type Parameters:
    ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the expandable list adapter's child items

    public interface DecoratorFactory<ChildType>
    Defines the interface, a factory, which should allow to create instances of the class SelectableListDecorator must implement. The decorators, which are created by such factories are used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the child items of an ExpandableListAdapter. These decorators usually are wrappers, which delegate the method calls to an expandable list adapter's actual decorator.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SelectableListDecorator<ChildType> createDecorator()
      Creates a decorator, which allows to customize the appearance, of the views, which are used to visualize the child items of an expandable list adapter.

    • Method Detail

      • createDecorator

        SelectableListDecorator<ChildType> createDecorator()
        Creates a decorator, which allows to customize the appearance, of the views, which are used to visualize the child items of an expandable list adapter.
        Returns:
        The decorator, which has been created, as an instance of the class SelectableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
